title: Arsenal v West Ham, Manchester United v Sunderland, and more: football – live
summary: Tom Bassam will provide updates on goals and news from various leagues and matches. Tune in for the latest happenings in the world of football. Stay informed about all the action on the pitch!

title: Greta Thunberg says she is being detained by Israel in cell ‘infested with bedbugs’
summary: An activist reported to Swedish officials that she has experienced harsh treatment during her detention, including a lack of adequate food and water. She expressed concerns about her conditions. The allegations have raised questions about the treatment of individuals in custody.

title: Chelsea v Liverpool: Premier League – live
summary: Rob Smyth provides a minute-by-minute report as the champions prepare for an important match in London ahead of the international break. Fans can expect a thrilling game filled with crucial moments. Stay tuned for live updates and insights.

title: The rise of digital money poses significant challenges for regulators
summary: The Bank of England is evaluating its stance on cryptocurrencies, facing decisions on regulatory measures and frameworks governing digital transactions. This crossroads comes amid growing interest and use of cryptocurrencies in the financial sector. The central bank aims to ensure stability while accommodating innovation in the digital currency space.

title: Premier League top scorers 2025-26: who is leading race for golden boot?
summary: Top scorers in the English Premier League are showcasing their talents as the season progresses. Key players are vying for the coveted Golden Boot title. Check out the latest standings to see who is leading the goalscoring race.
